Reviews.Title: “Good location, reasonable price”

Reviews.Content: comfortable staff helpful time offered cup tea bathroom basic shower recess clean excellent location sultanahmet close tram stop sirkeci convenient travel airport tram dont luggage wifi

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel and good staff!!”
Reviews.Author: Riitta Y
Reviews.Content: trip istanbul nice weeks low budget im happy nice hotel hotel nice warm clean bedgood turkish breakfast staff reception feel cosy food fantastic pillow bar call relax enjoy turkish tea beverage eat nice food location hotel greatclose blue mosque hagia sophia spice market grand bazaar topkapi stops minutes walk

Reviews.Title: “Great price, great hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Nina G
Reviews.Content: friend enjoyed staying hotel nice hotel clean food helpful nice staff located centre walk worth istanbul wont choose hotel

Reviews.Title: “City visit - Good value for money”
Reviews.Author: Adrijana H
Reviews.Content: value money hotel situated center main attractions easily accessed hotel public transports door step restaurants hotel clean staff friendly try restaurant special meal worth single eur dont spend money hotel overnights choice

Reviews.Title: “Very cute hotel, great service.”
Reviews.Author: Theapigen
Reviews.Content: hotel cute inexpensive hotel phenomenal location huge functional charming bathrooms nice staff wonderful restaurant reception feel welcome food restaurant inexpensive receptionist mehmet spoke english helpful whatever experience ill staying time istanbul

Reviews.Title: “lot of value for money and good service :D”
Reviews.Author: gina s
Reviews.Content: looking spend lot money hotel hotel value money doing renovation stay newly renovated bathroom nice otherwise clean comfortable bed breakfast normal turkish standard nice reastaurant hotel food pluss hotel definitely staff speak fluently english hotel central lot attractions walking distance easy public tranportation city stay
